title: T.V. commercials: four types
brief_description: A series of commercials using different approaches: hard sell, with emphasis on product and brand name; hard sell message with soft sell approach; soft sell, in which the emphasis is not solely on the product; and the testimonial technique for viewer identification. Products featured: Tarax, ANZ Christmas Club, ANZ Travel, Export Action, ANZ Cheque Account, Sidchrome.
